import MealItemStyles from '../../styles/MealItem.module.css' import MealForm from './MealForm'; const MealItem = (props) => { const price = `$ ${props.meal.price.toFixed(2)}` return (

  • {props.meal.name}

    {props.meal.description}
    {price}
    • ) } export default MealItem;
